template.name: Template Kaspersky Security Center
template.description:
Kasperscy Security Center Template
Windows Server 2008R2 SP1, Powershell 2.0, Kaspersky Security Center 10
https://github.com/zbx-sadman/KSC
Requirement: ksc.ps1 v.0.9

item.name: KSC Server build
Number of managed hosts in "Unassigned" group
Number of managed hosts on which Anti-virus application is installed but not running
Number of managed hosts on which Anti-virus application is installed but real-time protection is not running
Number of managed hosts on which Anti-virus application is not installed
Number of managed hosts on which Anti-virus bases were updated too long ago
Number of managed hosts on which AV bases were updated between an 1..3 days ago
Number of managed hosts on which AV bases were updated between an 1..24 hour ago
Number of managed hosts on which AV bases were updated between an 3..7 days ago
Number of managed hosts on which AV bases were updated more than 7 days ago
Number of managed hosts on which full scan performed too long ago
Number of managed hosts on which network agent is inactive too long
Number of managed hosts on which number of viruses detected is too much
Number of managed hosts on which RTP state is 'Failure'
Number of managed hosts on which RTP state is 'Running'
Number of managed hosts on which RTP state is 'Starting'
Number of managed hosts on which RTP state is 'Stopped'
Number of managed hosts on which RTP state is 'Suspended'
Number of managed hosts on which RTP state is 'Unknown'
Number of managed hosts with status 'Critical'
Number of managed hosts with status 'OK'
Number of managed hosts with status 'Warning'

trigger_prototype.name: [{#KLLIC_SERIAL}] Less than 10 days left to license expiring
